nodes.title: Official Court Drawings come under fire for too much emotion
nodes.description:
The MOON (a fake paper) tries to bring a smile in amongst the constant hell of this real story  

So many lies already proven to be lies yet the gutter press continue with their own fabrication of the truth.. The Sun who it clearly appears fabricated photos with AH to make out assault then the Daily mail who can not help but keep using lines from Monty Python & the Holy Grail as their proof (yet miss the fact that she had just verbally and mentally abused a minor prior to the text messages)TMZ keep claiming copyright of photos that have been out in the public domain for ages before AH sells some to them... Use edit videos to try and sell a false story. 

One day the IPSO will actually take control of the media and bring them up to the standards that they are all supposed to adhere to .

nodes.title: Remove Amber Heard from Aquaman2 passes 4 million...
nodes.description:
A massive shout out to Jeanne and what she has done with her petition. Though started out as a petition to remove AH from AQ2 it has ended up becoming so much more to so many people. Whether a stand against the media and their own stories rather than facts. Whether a stand up for Victims in general. A victim can be any age, and any gender we should remember that first we are Human beings, and we should try and treat others as we would like to be treated. 

So well done to Jeanne and the Justice for Johnny Depp community as a whole. Please sign Jeanne's main petition and and lets get that to 4.5 Million and then lets just see where. We can make a difference and out voices are being heard. 

Of course if you want to sign here for Miss Piggy as a bit of fun the please do. 

Thankyou

EW

nodes.title: Dior stands with Depp... Do You?
nodes.description:
Dior Proudly has backed Johnny throughout ..and with good reason. The facts were out that and they did not ignore them. People have been coming out in their droves to back Lepplady with her awesome effort to show that we can be heard and that our voices matter. Her campaign to get Turd removed from Aquaman 2 has Gone pass 3.9 million and is nearing 4 million.. How long before it reaches 4.5...

Could there be 6 million who will back this before the end of the trial... Or will it hit 8 million.. You just never know.

nodes.title: Austin is asked to take a photo of the TURD for the media
nodes.description:
On Thursday just gone Dr Dave and his PR machine contacted world famous photographer Austin Powers to assist with a photo of the Turd. Issues have risen because the Turd has been unable to shed a tear. Because of this during the trial on Thursday the Turd with the help of DR Dave staged a photo for the press so it would appear that she was upset.

Austin works for the truth and justice and has supplied a full document account of what happened. The attached series of photos show what occurred.

nodes.title: Is Jason Momoa trying to get his dear friend Miss Piggy into the part of Mera
nodes.description:
Rumours are abound as Jason is spotted with Miss Piggy. They have a friendship that formed in Stargate Atlantis where she played his ex girl friend. Is this the Chemistry that we are after

It is believed that Momoa is secretly pushing for Miss Piggy due to his friendship and admiration of such a string female who has always held her ground and made a difference. A spokes person for Warner Bros refused to confirm or deny. 

However FairFax studios Whippy Bros believe that a 6 movie deal has secretly been offered to her
